weather_report:
The tranquil serenity of Herdsman greets us today under a vast expanse of clear skies. It is the sort of morning that still carries the luminescent memories of the predawn stars it has just chased away. As we speak, the early morning chill is giving way to warmer breezes that herald the arrival of the sun, still invisible on the horizon. An azure firmament promises a day full of golden sunshine, rendering spectroscopic displays on any object in its path.

This promises to be a day to loosen those scarf knots, let the embrace of sunlight enrapture you, and relish in the mastery of nature. Dressing for the day should be an affair of light, comfortable layers, soothing to the touch as the sun inspires the day. One might take this as a day to bask in the quietude of the morning, to take an unhurried walk in the park, or to delight in an al fresco breakfast. This promises, indeed, to be a day where ordinary tasks take on an aura of unparalleled veneration in the luminous light of the anticipated day.
